name: You Can't Win (Modestalpha)
description:
This is  'MY GAME'.

 Kidding, there is nothing in this game to be proud of. It's just a silly game based on your luck. If you are lucky enough, you will get the win; otherwise, you will also get frustrated like me.

Just give it a try and send the screenshot if you WIN.

Remember, If you are extremely lucky then only you will win.

Best of Luck!!!
